commit.message: Add `.stderr` files for shadowed labels where the point of the test is to test such cases.

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,300 @@

+LL |         'x: loop { $e }

+   |         -- first declared here
+LL |             // this 'x should refer to the outer loop, lexically
+LL |             loop_x!(break 'x);
+   |             ------------------ in this macro invocation

+warning: label name `'b` shadows a label name that is already in scope
+  --> $DIR/macro-lifetime-used-with-labels.rs:31:9
+   |
+LL |         'b: loop {
+   |         ^^ lifetime 'b already in scope
+...
+LL |     'b: loop {
+   |     -- first declared here
+LL |         br2!('b);
+   |         --------- in this macro invocation
+
